description: Critical datasets - Perfect fit for business case

zenodo_wind_turbine_failures.name: Correlation Between Wind Turbine Failures and Environmental Factors
zenodo_wind_turbine_failures.description: Wind turbine failure dataset with environmental correlations. Proxy for telecom tower maintenance. Includes repair times and costs.
zenodo_wind_turbine_failures.preprocessing_notes: Wind turbine failure data adapted for telecom tower maintenance forecasting. Environmental factors correlate with tower failures.
zenodo_wind_turbine_failures.notes: Proxy dataset for tower structural maintenance

_evaluation.recommendation: CRITICAL - Perfect fit for business case

mit_telecom_parts.name: MIT Telecom Spare Parts Dataset
mit_telecom_parts.description: 3 years of data from 2,058 telecom sites (similar to Nova Corrente's 18,000 towers)
mit_telecom_parts.preprocessing_notes: Weekly aggregated data, may need to interpolate to daily. Highest relevance for validation.
mit_telecom_parts.notes: May require manual extraction or PDF parsing

_evaluation.recommendation: CRITICAL - Perfect fit for business case
reasons: BONUS: MIT telecom spare parts research (perfect match)

zenodo_broadband_brazil.name: Real Dataset from Broadband Customers of a Brazilian Telecom Operator
zenodo_broadband_brazil.description: Extracted from a major Brazilian operator, includes modem parameters (latency, jitter, packet loss) and user metrics for thousands of broadband users. Time-series snapshots.
zenodo_broadband_brazil.preprocessing_notes: Real Brazilian operator data with customer metrics (latency, jitter, packet loss, channel quality). Predictive modeling for demand in network maintenance. Long-tail insights into rare downtime events. No date column - may need temporal indexing. Operator-specific bias may exist.
zenodo_broadband_brazil.notes: Excellent for predictive maintenance in telecom logistics. Integrates well with SARIMAX/Prophet/LSTM ensembles. Note: No explicit date column - may require temporal indexing or synthetic timestamps.

_evaluation.recommendation: CRITICAL - Perfect fit for business case

mit_telecom_spare_parts.name: MIT SCM Project: Telecom Spare Parts Dataset
mit_telecom_spare_parts.description: MIT Supply Chain Management research on telecom spare parts demand. 3 years of data from 2,058 telecom sites.
mit_telecom_spare_parts.preprocessing_notes: MIT research paper on telecom spare parts. 3 years of data from 2,058 sites (similar to Nova Corrente's 18,000 towers). Weekly aggregated data, may need to interpolate to daily.
mit_telecom_spare_parts.notes: Critical reference dataset for telecom spare parts demand forecasting

_evaluation.recommendation: CRITICAL - Perfect fit for business case
reasons: BONUS: MIT telecom spare parts research (perfect match)
